thread.title: Edges2cats uses AI to turn cat doodles into nightmarish photos - Business Insider
thread.title_full: Edges2cats uses AI to turn cat doodles into nightmarish photos - Business Insider

author: Rob Price
title: Edges2cats uses AI to turn cat doodles into nightmarish photos - Business Insider
text:
Here's an example provided by Christopher Hesse. Looks pretty normal, right? Pretty good, even. Most don't look like this. Christopher Hesse Now here's an example drawn by my colleague James Cook. Its eyes are screaming. James Cook/BI The results get even more surreal if you tweak cats' physiology. Rob Price/BI And non-feline images become absolutely monstrous. Rob Price/BI Twitter is having a field day with the tool. 
The results are ... mixed. 
The AI has been trained on 2,000 images of cats â€” and it now tries to interpret whatever it sees as a feline, no matter how bizarre the results. 
The tech is basic right now, but it could one day have real-world applications. "In a few years this tech is going to be incredibly helpful for matte painters & concept artists," Tim Soret wrote on Twitter. Just click the link below to play with Edges2cats for yourself. Lindsay Dodgson/BI
